short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track posts on Gondola (https://gondola.cc) with one click on Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gondola (https://gondola.cc) is tool for creators and brands to keep track of the work they do on social media.

Gondola Link Tracker simplifies adding content to your Gondola profile. While you're viewing a Twitter tweet, YouTube video, Instagram post, or TikTok video simply click the Gondola icon in your toolbar. Gondola imports the post so you can give yourself credit for it!
